recordSet.name: Patients
recordSet.description: Demographic and administrative data for each patient in the synthetic dataset, generated by Synthea.

recordSet.name: Observations
recordSet.description: All numerical and categorical observations, including vital signs and lab results from Synthea.

recordSet.name: Medical Conditions
recordSet.description: Diagnosed medical conditions recorded for patients, as generated by Synthea.

recordSet.name: Medical Images (Placeholder)
recordSet.description: This is a placeholder RecordSet. Synthea does not generate imaging data, but this structure is included to maintain compatibility with multi-modal analysis schemas. It contains no fields.
